title: Meditation: Gateway to Natural Presence (2020-07-22)
itunes:title: Meditation: Gateway to Natural Presence
description: Meditation: Gateway to Natural Presence (2020-07-22) - We enter a full presence through awakening our senses, and awakening to the awareness that is aware. This meditation guides us as we arouse an embodied presence, let go of any controlling, then discover the natural spaciousness and wakefulness that is the essence of what we are.
